author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Association of Indian Universities has given the honour for Alagappa University to organise the inter-university handball tournament for men and women at the university here from January 4 to 8.

A university release here said 56 men teams and 47 women teams from south Indian universities would take part in the event that would feature as many as 1,648 players showcasing their prowess in the knockout-cum-league competitions. National and State-level umpires have been deputed as referees and the participating teams started arriving from Saturday, the release said. The university constituted committees to conduct the tournament in a successful manner.

Vice-Chancellor S. Subbiah would preside over the inaugural ceremony on Monday.
title: Varsity to conduct handball tourney
